source:
select
select 
MeterCategory, sum(cost) cost
from enrollment_delta
where month(date)>=7
group by MeterCategory
having sum(cost) >= 1000
--order by 2 desc

Select min(date) date, weekofyear(a.date) Wk, a.MeterCategory, avg(dailyCost) avgDailyCost
from
(SELECT date, MeterCategory, sum(cost) dailyCost
from enrollment
where meterCategory in ("Storage","Azure Databricks","Azure Synapse Analytics","Cognitive Services","Azure API for FHIR","SQL Database")
group by date, MeterCategory) a
where weekofyear(a.date) < 40
group by a.MeterCategory, weekofyear(a.date)
Order by 1

SELECT
    d.wk,
    d.meterCategory,
    d.avgDailyCostGrowth
FROM
(
SELECT
    c.date,
    c.wk,
    c.meterCategory,
    (c.avgDailyCost -  c.avgDailyCost2) / c.avgDailyCost2 avgDailyCostGrowth
FROM
(

SELECT
    b.date,
    b.wk,
    b.meterCategory,
    b.avgDailyCost,
    lag(b.avgDailyCost, 1) over (partition by b.meterCategory order by b.date) avgDailyCost2
FROM
(
Select 
    min(date) date, 
    weekofyear(a.date) Wk, 
    a.MeterCategory, 
    avg(dailyCost) avgDailyCost
from
(
        SELECT date, MeterCategory, sum(cost) dailyCost
        from enrollment
        where meterCategory in ("Azure Data Factory v2")
        group by date, MeterCategory
) a
group by 
    a.MeterCategory, 
    weekofyear(a.date)
having min(date) < "2022-10-03"
) b
) c
WHERE c.avgDailyCost2 IS NOT NULL
) d
PIVOT (
  d.avgDailyCostGrowth
  FOR d.wk in ( 14,15,16,17,18
    
  )
)
ORDER BY meterCategory DESC

Select min(date) date, weekofyear(a.date) Wk, a.MeterCategory, avg(dailyCost) avgDailyCost
from
(SELECT date, MeterCategory, sum(cost) dailyCost
from enrollment_delta
where meterCategory in ("Azure Cosmos DB")
group by date, MeterCategory) a
group by a.MeterCategory, weekofyear(a.date)
Order by 1

select weekofyear(date) wk, avg(cost) avgDailyCost
FROM
(
Select 
    date, sum(Cost) cost
from enrollment_delta
where MeterCategory in ("Azure Synapse Analytics") 
Group by date
)
group by weekofyear(date)
order by 1

select weekofyear(date) wk, avg(cost) avgDailyCost
FROM
(
Select 
    date, sum(Cost) cost
from enrollment_delta
where MeterCategory in ("Cognitive Services") 
Group by date
)
group by weekofyear(date)
order by 1
